body_html:
For this email project, since we are covering all the email languages, I will set it up the standard way.

Is there a way to preserve the comment in the output file? https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Fe1LiqF5E6GDpvkMzds4ZOcyc85091K6LGCV6Bmcfr4/edit#gid=485606406. This has a lot of comments. Alternatively, I can copy the translated strings to the original file from the requester.

body:
For this email project, since we are covering all the email languages, I will set it up the standard way. 

Is there a way to preserve the comment in the output file? https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Fe1LiqF5E6GDpvkMzds4ZOcyc85091K6LGCV6Bmcfr4/edit#gid=485606406. This has a lot of comments. Alternatively, I can copy the translated strings to the original file from the requester.
